channel.title: Therapy Range – Medika Supplies
channel.description: Supply quality products to the medical industries

item.title: SEERS 2 Section Therapy Couch – Basic & Plus Models
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: 2 Section Therapy Table - Model Choices ST2558 - Basic head design - hydraulic height elevation ST2568 - Basic head design - electric height elevation ST2559 - Plus head design - hydraulic height elevation ST2569 - Plus head design - electric height elevation Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Basic & Plus Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 240kgs (528lbs=37 stone)
  • Choice of manual or electric height operation
  • Choice of models both with positive and negative adjustment of head section
  • The power assisted head section incorporates anti-trap design
  • Excellent height range from 45cm (18”) to 98cm (38”)
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models
  • Retractable wheel design and adjustable foot for stability on uneven surfaces
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Perimeter foot switch operation for electric models
  • Single foot switch operation for electric models
  • Double foot switch operation for electric models
  • Paper towel holder
  • Side support rails and cushions
  • Upper limb support
  • Removable head/knee support
  • Matching therapy chair or stool

For further details on accessories please call.

item.title: SEERS 2 Section Therapy Couch – Standard Model
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
A very strong and rigid couch available with a  traditional “Standard” head section design, complete with breathing hole and removable plug for prone treatments.

2 Section Therapy Table - Standard Model Choices

ST2557 - Standard head design - hydraulic height elevation ST2567 - Standard head design - electric height elevation Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 240kgs (528lbs=37 stone)
  • Choice of 2 models – manual or electric height operation
  • The power assisted head section incorporates anti-trap design
  • Excellent height range from 45cm (18”) to 98cm (38”)
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models
  • Retractable wheel design and adjustable foot for stability on uneven surfaces
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Perimeter foot switch operation for electric models
  • Single foot switch operation for electric models
  • Double foot switch operation for electric models
  • Paper towel holder
  • Side support rails and cushions
  • Upper limb support
  • Removable head/knee support
  • Matching therapy chair or stool

For further details on accessories please call.

Please see accessories page for details

item.title: SEERS 3 Section Therapy Couch – Basic & Plus Models
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
Incorporating both an adjustable angle backrest and a choice of head section designs “Basic” or “Plus” model with adjustable height armrests, these models are very versatile and suitable for a wide range of manual therapy techniques and various patient examination procedures.

3 Section Therapy Table - Basic & Plus Model Choices

ST3558 - Basic head design - hydraulic height elevation ST3568 - Basic head design - electric height elevation ST3559 - Plus head design (with adjustable height armrests) - hydraulic height elevation ST3569 - Plus head design (with adjustable height armrests) - electric height elevation Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 240kgs (528lbs=37 stone)
  • Choice of manual or electric height operation
  • Choice of 2 models “Basic” or “Plus” head section
  • The power assisted head section incorporates anti-trap design
  • Excellent height range from 45cm (18”) to 98cm (38”)
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models
  • Retractable wheel design and adjustable foot for stability on uneven surfaces
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Perimeter foot switch operation for electric models
  • Single foot switch operation for electric models
  • Double foot switch operation for electric models
  • Paper towel holder
  • Side support rails and cushions
  • Upper limb support
  • Removable head/knee support
  • Matching therapy chair or stool

item.title: SEERS 3 Section Therapy Drop End Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: An extremely strong and rigid 3 section couch incorporating both an adjustable angle backrest and a single drop end head section, these models are suitable for a wide range of manual therapy and patient examination procedures. 3 Section Therapy Drop End Couch - Model Choice ST3556 - Hydraulic Height Elevation ST3566 - Electric Height Elevation Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 240kgs (528lbs = 37.7 stone)
  • Adjustable angle backrest from horizontal to +80 degrees positive
  • Adjustable angle head section from +10 to -90 degrees negative
  • The power assisted backrest and foot sections incorporate anti-trap design gas struts
  • Head section standard with breathing hole and plug
  • Choice of manual or electric height elevation
  • Excellent height range from 48 – 101cm (19″ – 39″)
  • Retractable wheel design and adjustable foot for stability on uneven surfaces
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models
  • Standard width 65cm (25″)
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Perimeter foot switch operation for electric models
  • Single foot switch operation for electric models
  • Double foot switch operation for electric models
  • Paper towel holder
  • Upper limb support
  • Matching therapy chair or stool
  • Removable head/knee support

For further details on accessories please call.

item.title: SEERS Bobath Therapy Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: By tradition, Bobath treatment techniques require a suitably wide treatment surface with a safe and capable lifting capacity for both patient and therapist. The Bobath Therapy range of couches has more than achieved this with a choice of 2 sizes and a higher than standard safe working load of 250kgs (550lbs=39 stone) Bobath Therapy Couch - Model Choices ST4552 - Bobath Therapy Couch hydraulic - width 105cm (41") ST4562 - Bobath Therapy Couch electric - width 105cm (41") ST4542 - Bobath Therapy Couch electric with electric backrest-width 105cm (41") ST4552W - Bobath Therapy Couch hydraulic - width 125cm (49") ST4562W - Bobath Therapy Couch electric - width 125cm (49") ST4542W - Bobath Therapy Couch electric with electric backrest, width 125cm (49") Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 250kgs (550lbs=39 stone)
  • The power assisted head and foot section incorporates anti-trap design
  • Choice of upholstery width-105cm (41”) or125cm (49”) or extra large model 150cm (59”)
  • Choice of manual or electric height elevation
  • Excellent height range from 46cm (18”) to 100cm (39”)
  • Retractable wheel design and adjustable foot for stability on uneven surfaces
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Hand switch fitted as standard on electric models
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Perimeter foot switch operation for electric models
  • Single foot switch operation for electric models
  • Side support rails and cushions
  • Bobath patient limb support
  • Patient handgrip supports

For further details on accessories please call.

item.title: SEERS Child Tilt Table
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
Specifically designed to cater for children of all ages through to young adult, these variable height Child Tilt Tables feature dual leg fixation and a wide footboard with fixation facility for securing the feet. The Child Tilt Table is also supplied with a range of standard accessories including a pommel and pelvic supports for added security.

Child Tilt Table - Model Choices

ST7650 - Economy Child Tilt Table with braked castor system - electric ST7651 - Standard Child Tilt Table with central locking wheel system - electric Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Model Specification

  • Safe working load with lifting and tilting capacity (from minimum height) of 200kgs (440lbs=31.4 stone)
  • Large wheel design with central locking and steering facility on Standard model
  • Individual braking castors on Economy model
  • Electric height and tilting operation via hand switch control
  • Height range 47cm – 101cm (18″-39″), tilt angle from horizontal to +90 degrees
  • Dual leg fixation of the knees with adjustable height pommel for support
  • Adjustable pelvic supports for additional stabilisation
  • Wide footboard with fixation points for the feet, with straps included
  • Lowers to wheelchair height for ease of patient transfer
  • Tilt angle inclinometer fitted as standard
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Supplied with patient handgrips and set of harnesses
  • 60mm upholstery incorporating memory foam membrane for added comfort
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Model 6057 Battery back-up facility
  • Model 7648 Adjustable Worktable
  • Model 6007 Head Support Cushion
  • Model 6095 Child Tilt Table Harness Set

item.title: SEERS Deluxe Bobath Therapy Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
This top of the range Bobath couch has a safe working load and lifting capacity of 325kgs(51 stone/715lbs) and features electric backrest operation and a large wheel design with steering facility and central locking. There is a choice of optional accessories for various neurological procedures.

Deluxe Bobath Therapy Couch- Model Choices

ST4642 - Electric with electric backrest - large wheel design - 105cm ST4642W - Electric with electric backrest - large wheel design - 125cm Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 325kgs (51 stone)
  • Powered electric backrest fully adjustable from horizontal to 85 degrees positive
  • Choice of model width-105cm (41″) or 125cm (49″)
  • Electric height operation
  • Excellent height range of 45-98cm (18-38″)
  • Large wheel design with steering facility and central locking from a single level operation
  • Hand switch fitted as standard
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Model ST6057 Battery back-up
  • Model ST6074 Side Support Rails (each)
  • Model ST6074P Side Support Rail Cushion (each)
  • Model 6012 Bobath patient limb support for use only at food end of couch
  • Model 6013 Patient handgrip supports for use only at food end of couch (pair)
  • Model ST6073 Accessory rail for fixation of patient handgrip supports on the side of couch – one required per side.

For further details on accessories please call.

item.title: SEERS Deluxe Portable Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description:
With a very strong aluminium frame and 4 cable suspension system, this high quality deluxe portable couch can be set up in 10 seconds! Features include adjustable height leg system, a ten position adjustable angle backrest, breathing hole and plug and a safe working load of 230kgs

Deluxe Portable Couch - Model Choice

ST2702 - Deluxe portable couch Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Model Specification

  • Very strong aluminium frame with 4 cable suspension system
  • Very quick and easy to set up – less than 10 seconds
  • 10 position adjustable backrest with range from 0 – 75 degrees
  • Breathing holes and removable pluf fitted as standard
  • Maximum Safe Working Load of 230kgs (506lbs)
  • Adjustable height leg system of 59 – 81cm (23″ – 32″)
  • Product weight of 14.5 kgs
  • Access for therapists knees at both ends of the table
  • Available in stock colour of Dark Blue upholstery
  • Supplied complete with heavy duty carrying case
  • Dimensions of 185cm long x 62cm wide

item.title: SEERS Deluxe Therapy Couch
item.dc:creator: siaru1
item.description: Incorporating an integral perimeter foot switch as standard and with a choice of "Standard", "Basic" or "Plus" head section design, these models are very versatile and suitable for a wide range of manual therapy procedures. Deluxe Therapy Couch - Model Choices ST3347 - Deluxe Therapy Couch with Standard head design ST3347S - Deluxe Therapy Couch with Standard head design - split leg ST3348 - Deluxe Therapy Couch with Basic head design ST3348S - Deluxe Therapy Couch with Basic head design - split leg ST3349 - Deluxe Therapy Couch with Plus head design ST3349S - Deluxe Therapy Couch withPlus head design - split leg Download PDF
item.content:encoded:
Standard Model Specification

  • Safe working load and lifting capacity (from minimum height) of 240kgs (528lbs=37 stone)
  • The power assisted head and foot section incorporates anti-trap design
  • Choice of Standard, Basic or Plus head design with adjustable angle
  • Electric height elevation via integral perimeter foot switch
  • Excellent height range from 46-99cm (19”-39”)
  • Retractable wheel design and adjustable foot for stability on uneven surfaces
  • Purpose made precision bearings on all pivot points
  • Clearance beneath frame for mobile hoist
  • Head section fitted with breathing hole and plug
  • Choice of upholstery colours

Optional Couch Accessories

  • Paper towel holder
  • Matching therapy chair or stool
  • Removable head/knee support
  • Protective Base Shroud

For further details on accessories please call.
